top_comments.comment:
During your upcoming emulation test, would you consider trying out “Hot Wheels: Ultimate Racing” for the PSP?
I’ve been looking for a way to play that game on the go, and this new PowKiddy handheld seems like the right way to go (price notwithstanding).

comments_since_last_sample.body: Can this play xcloud and ps4 remote play with the built-in remote?
I think that  $180 is too expensive for retro handheld. It is dead-on-arrival. Using Unisoc T310 (4 core 1*A76+3*A55)  + 2GB RAM would be better to reduce cost.
